snippet: Kevin Durant had 34 points and 14 rebounds as Oklahoma City rallied from a 15-point halftime deficit to win its fourth straight game against San Antonio after losing the first two games of the series.
abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder win the NBA Western Conference finals, defeating the San Antonio Spurs, 107-99, in Game 6.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Durant had 34 points and 14 rebounds as Oklahoma City rallied from a 15-point halftime deficit to win its fourth straight game against San Antonio after losing the first two games of the series.

headline.seo: Thunder Beat Spurs to Reach N.B.A. Finals
headline.main: Thunder Headed to N.B.A. Finals After Knocking Out Spurs
headline.content_kicker: Western Conference Finals Game 6: Thunder 107, Spurs 99
